CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Clock_In_Location__Latitude__s)), NOT(ISBLANK(Clock_In_Location__Longitude__s)), Clock_In_Location__Latitude__s <> 0, Clock_In_Location__Longitude__s <> 0, NOT(ISBLANK(Customer_Location__Latitude__s)), NOT(ISBLANK(Customer_Location__Longitude__s)), Customer_Location__Latitude__s <> 0, Customer_Location__Longitude__s <> 0 ), DISTANCE( GEOLOCATION(Customer_Location__Latitude__s, Customer_Location__Longitude__s), GEOLOCATION(Clock_In_Location__Latitude__s, Clock_In_Location__Longitude__s), 'km' ), 0 )
CustomField.label: Distance
